abstract: Creates a player item with the specified asset and the asset keys to automatically load.
overview:
## Return Value

An initialized instance of `AVPlayerItem`.

## Discussion

The value of each key in `automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys` will automatically be loaded by the underlying [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset] before the player item achieves the status [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]; i.e. when the item is ready to play, the value returned by invoking the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/asset] property’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/statusOfValue(forKey:error:)] method will be one of the terminal status values, either [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/loaded], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/failed], or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/cancelled].

# init(asset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:)

**Initializer**

Creates a player item with the specified asset and the asset keys to automatically load.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(asset: AVAsset, automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys: [String]?)
```

## Parameters

- **asset**: An instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset].
- **automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys**: An array of strings, each representing a property defined by [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset].

## Return Value

An initialized instance of `AVPlayerItem`.

## Discussion

The value of each key in `automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys` will automatically be loaded by the underlying [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset] before the player item achieves the status [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]; i.e. when the item is ready to play, the value returned by invoking the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/asset] property’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/statusOfValue(forKey:error:)] method will be one of the terminal status values, either [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/loaded], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/failed], or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/cancelled].

## Creating a player item

- **init(url:)**: Creates a player item with a specified URL.
- **init(asset:)**: Creates a player item for a specified asset.
- **init(asset:)**
- **init(asset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:)**: Creates a player item for the asset, and automatically loads values for the specified properties.
- **init(asset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:)**
